Package org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles

Class CharacterShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles.ShapeDrawer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles.AbstractShape
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles.CharacterShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsShape, Key
    public final class CharacterShape
extends AbstractShape
    This is a shape which can draw a character on the tile.
    This object is also a shape drawer.
    The font size is calculated automatically based on tile size.
    It designs a char in the the following tile sections (A and B):
     +---------+---------+
 |         |         |
 |    A    |         |
 |         |         |
 +---------+---------+
 |         |         |
 |         |    B    |
 |         |         |
 +---------+---------+
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

        Draws the tile applying the requested shape.
        Specified by:
        drawTile in class ShapeDrawer
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        backgroundColor - background of tile
        shapeColor - color of shape
        size - the size of tile, which is a square

      • drawChar

        private void drawChar​(Context2dItem context,
                      int size,
                      double offsetX,
                      double offsetY,
                      String character,
                      int fontSize,
                      TextMetricsItem metrics)
        Designs a char in the a tile section.
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        size - the size of tile, which is a square
        offsetX - offset X where starts drawing
        offsetY - offset Y where starts drawing
        character - character to draw on the tile
        fontSize - font size to apply to character
        metrics - canvas metrics to know the width of character

      • calculateFont

        private IsImmutableFont calculateFont​(Context2dItem context,
                                      String value,
                                      double size,
                                      String family)
        Calculates the font based on available space of the tile.
        Parameters:
        context - context of canvas to design the shape
        value - character to draw
        size - size of tile
        family - font family to use to apply the char on tile
        Returns:
        the immutable font
